org.soulspace.template.tokenizer
Class Token

java.lang.Object
  org.soulspace.template.tokenizer.Token

public class Token
extends java.lang.Object

Class for Tokens of the TemplateEngine. A token represents a tokenized part of the template.

Author:
soulman
